title: An Act authorizing the division of capital asset management and maintenance to convey certain parcels of land to the city of Framingham

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Sousa of Framingham and Lewis of Framingham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3418) of Priscila S. Sousa and Jack Patrick Lewis that the commissioner of the Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance be authorized to convey certain parcels of land in the city of Framingham to said city.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/09/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means
